programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Informational programme covering stories about worldwide politics, business and everything in between. The journalists report on the top news stories from these two fields, and interview experts who share their thoughts on a wide range of relevant topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors unique insight into Chinas economy, with in-depth analysis and conversations with newsmakers.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East and Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak
programme.desc: Dont miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Take a look at the latest news in finance, economics and investment, most important business stories and the state of the markets as each day begins. Join hosts Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua, who broadcast live from New York to London each morning and discuss markets with various leaders in global finance and economics. Find out everything you need to know about stocks, bonds, currencies and commodities in Bloomberg Surveillance.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Bloomberg Open Interest with Matt Miller and Dani Burger - delivers the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: A weekly show on fixed income with the biggest names in the field, covering sovereign and credit markets as investors grapple with fiscal, monetary and financial factors.

programme.title: Next Africa
programme.desc: A monthly deep dive into Africas biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africas quest of bridging the gap with global powers.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Informational programme covering stories about worldwide politics, business and everything in between. The journalists report on the top news stories from these two fields, and interview experts who share their thoughts on a wide range of relevant topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek
programme.desc: Follow presenters Carol Massar and Jason Kelly as they provide viewers with anecdotes and insights behind the articles found in award-winning magazine Bloomberg BusinessWeek. Anchors cover the breaking business news, while the writers and editors of the magazine share their views on various topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld break down the days top market-moving stories and trading action around the closing bell.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Informational programme covering stories about worldwide politics, business and everything in between. The journalists report on the top news stories from these two fields, and interview experts who share their thoughts on a wide range of relevant topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry. Whether its CEOs, professors or politicians, each offer their forthright opinions on the financial positives and negatives across the USA, evaluating the significance of the present climate and how they believe the country can continue to improve.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.sub-title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
programme.desc: Join financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics - Bill Gates, Warren Buffett, Indra Nooyi, Condoleezza Rice, Phil Knight, Bill Clinton, George W Bush,... hearing their life stories and how they became people they are today.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Bobert finds hes infected with a virus called love.exe he asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word love. When they try to explain it through song, it gets him no closer to an answer, so he asks the other residents of Elmore to give their versions of what love means to them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is on a crucial quest to transport an ice sculpture of Admiral Lovejoy to a celebration for her in Weymouth, when the figurehead of the Mighty Windbreaker breaks off and is lost at sea. Unfortunately for Lana, this triggers Andar and the crews superstitious phobia of sailing without a figurehead, putting Lanas quest and the Mighty Windbreaker in great peril.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: On her 12th birthday, Lana looks forward to embarking on a life of adventure with her legendary father, only for Andar to hang up his war-hammer and retire to spend more time with her on sleepy Shediac. Undeterred, Lana follows her dream to join the Guild on his ship, finding odd allies and antagonists along the way, including her own dad.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball is livid when an online test keeps telling him that his character-type is "The Loser". Hes convinced that the only way to shake off this label is to do the opposite of everything he normally would. But Gumball suppressing his natural instincts leaves a vacuum, a Gumball-shaped hole that someone has to fill. That someone is Tobias, who starts turning the whole show into a cliched sitcom.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: A chance encounter with the woman of his dreams inspires Rocky to stop living life online and find love with the help of the latest dating app. Gumball and Darwin try to help Rocky through the tricky world of online romance. In the race to find Rockys dream girl they discover that people can forgive almost anything when you tell them youre acting in the name of love.

programme.desc: Duncan tries to hide his newfound secret power: kitting. But after using it to save his classmates he proudly admits it.

programme.title: Total DramaRama

programme.title: Total DramaRama

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When the crew dock at the Guild for a ship inspection, Lana and Boreas are in charge of keeping the Mighty Windbreaker pristine while the crew go ashore for various errands. The two kids try to spruce up the boat, only to leave it a wreck in a series of mishaps and cons by Trash Imp. Now Lana and Bo must race around Weymouth to repair the Windbreaker before Andar and crew return with Admiral Lovejoy.

programme.title: Clarence

programme.title: Clarence

Specs is now the tough guy, and Skinny is now the dork, and their early adventures set in motion a bunch of other consequences, too. Embittered, angry boss? Check. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Looney Builders are asked to build a party boat for Mac and Tosh, Tweety makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its summer and Spikes the primary beneficiary of Ricks daily grilling ritual; the pooch is tossed a nice juicy T-bone nightly. When Spike gets stuck trying to exit the doghouse, he realises its time to back off the beef. Spike orders Tom to hide the tempting T-bones and no matter what he says or does dont let him have them! Of course its a lose-lose scenario for Tom: Spike becomes angry if Tom caves in to his demands and gives him the steaks and even angrier if he doesnt! When Jerry moves one of the nightly T-bones from Toms latest hiding place, it triggers a series of unfortunate events when Spikes hunger becomes too much. In the end, Spike loses the extra weight from chasing Tom. And when Jerry cant fit in his mouse hole because of the weight hes gained, justice is served!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Little Quacker is heartsick and hes come to the cat and mouse detectives to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quackers honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and hes counting on the cat and mouse detectives to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry arent about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A magical hat creates mayhem for Tom Jerry and Spike. / Tom accidentally zaps a marionette. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / Tom and Jerry each build their own booby-trapped bunker. / Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. / When Toms hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case hes sent to recover at the local animal hospital. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ricks got a procedure that requires him to not eat or drink for 12 hours. Thats not a lot of time for an everyday human, but to Rick its a lifetime. He makes a house rule: if he cant eat, no one can. Luckily, Jerry and Spike have a stockpile - no skin off their backs. Tom, on the other hand, is not so lucky. With the cupboards and refrigerator padlocked shut, the overly dramatic cat is left to survive the long cold night on the brink of starvation. Thats when he invites Little Quacker for a sleepover and Jerrys plan for a quiet night turns ugly. Little Quacker is tired of being the nice duck and between Jerry and Little Quacker, Toms got his work cut out for him. In the end, Rick has his dates wrong and Tom will have to go through this all over again next week.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany-- HES LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word - furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy (nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerrys spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and its about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Toms hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, hes sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case theyre working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, hes in traction and cant move. Thats okay, hes got a partner in crime-solving - Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ellas super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. Shes been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella cant say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Tillys playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Moms meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. Hes so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. Its up to Ella to jog Madhus memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats. But the Lemmings new personality makes them particularly overbearing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. The bear is already licking his chops, when he sees the Lemmings straddling the fish in a rodeo game. From inside the cabin he uses as a mooring post, Grizzy manages to snare the swordfish and is about to pull it in, but the Lemmings are riding it toward the high seas. Each party tugs hard. And the cabin starts to slide…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid. Except that the entire volcanic island shudders each time the drops are poured. Grizzy, who has decided to take a nap in his hammock, confiscates the bottle before realizing that the Lemmings have an entire stock !

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Magnetikus guides a giant meteor toward Kaboom City. Astroturbo, a newcomer, must stop it before it ends Kaboom City.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tom drifts off to sleep, a tumbleweed blows into his face, and he discovers that the kitchen looks like an old west saloon. The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom blows on a trumpet to dislodge Jerry from his hiding place, which leads to Frankie the rat convincing Tom hes a great trumpeter. Frankie plays manager, Jerry joins in as percussionist, and they audition neighborhood animals for a third member of their jazz trio. Unfortunately, when Spike is chosen on the upright double bass, rivalries spark up and nerves threaten the trios success.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be oudone Tom starts lifting weights as well which sets up an epic battle royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Everyones favorite cat-and-mouse duo, Tom and Jerry, is joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration in the all-new holiday special Santas Little Helpers. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop -- until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship? Directed by Darrel Van Citters and written by Jim Praytor and Robert Zappia, this wacky Tom and Jerry outing features the voice talents of Tom Kenny, Gary Cole, Simon Helberg, Julie Wittner, Grey DeLisle and Rachael MacFarlane.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued. / Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. / The Great Eduardo violinist supreme is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that he claims that he can play the violin better. / Mr Bean is in a trance - barks like a dog and starts to dance.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean has to look after an injured Mrs Wicket whose demands start to become a pain. / Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes a famous internet sensation. / Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesnt trust. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom drinks a potion and shrinks to the size of an insect, he begs Jerry Von Mouseling for help.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Jerrys British cousins Oliver and Alistair come for a visit after forgetting their wives birthdays.

programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Tom is jealous that Jerry is having fun on his play date with destiny, so he tries to ruin it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean makes a meal out of his Birthday celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean "the International Art Sleuth" prove successful?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Rival Doc nurses an old grudge against the Docs for getting him fired from the lab. This time he seeks revenge! He gets Specs and Skinny docs framed for knocking out the old night guard at the lab and kidnapping Lamput. Together in the prison, Lamput and the Docs join forces to unearth the truth and expose the actual culprit!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny is being kept awake by a bad case of the hiccups. Half asleep, he guzzles down a midnight drink. Turns out Specs has forgotten sharehouse rule number one: DONT KEEP EXPERIMENTAL LAB CONCOCTIONS IN THE KITCHEN FRIDGE. Skinnys hiccups dont get better. Unless you count "literally turning into a monster every time you hiccup" as "better". No point sitting around shedding on the furniture: Specs puts his newly monsterific buddy to good use as a Lamput-hunter. Which goes well until Skinny gets better. If you count being chased off into the distance by an angry bear as "better".

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build an ice bowling alley in Looneyburg. F

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Bam is secretly afraid of the dark - much to everyones surprise - but he must conquer his fears if he is to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as V-8 the Super-Spy, he quickly realises that he has gotten in way over his head.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger leave Tom home alone Tom and Jerry decide to invite their lady friends Toodles and Toots over for a romantic dinner. Things dont go as planned when they all start to get in each others way. Food fights and tempers rise when dinner goes haywire.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby works on creating a formula for a love potion which accidentally gets on Jerry when Napoleon tries to use it against Tom. Napoleon must work with Hamster and Bot to create the love potion spell to stop Tom from eating a lovestruck Jerry. Things go awry as his potions create a range of emotions from all the lab residents.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from attending a date with Toodles. When Butch shows up instead Toodles suprises him with babysitting her misbehaving nieces and nephews. Tom tries to escape from the basement but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think its a monster downstairs.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry and Tuffy are getting ready to go to a family reunion and theyre mailing themselves off! Unfortunately Tuffy gets left behind. Although Tom Thinks Tuffy is easy pickings hes in for a surprise as Tuffy makes his life really difficult. Jerry races back home when he realizes he left Tuffy behind.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry zip along Singapores vibrant riverside and make a new friend - Merli! Will Merli succeed in being the maestro of peace between the two?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean "the International Art Sleuth" prove successful?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput spends the day at the beach, and, in a pair of swimming trunks, cuts a fine figure indeed. That is to say; a small, round and blobby figure. It only takes one snide comment from a fellow beach-goer to bring Lamputs body issues to the surface. When youre a shape changer, though, theres no need for exercise; before long Lamput is strutting along as an orange amalgam of all the best-looking sunbakers. On the up side, its a handy disguise when the Docs come a-hunting. On the down side? Well, its kind of tiring pretending to be someone youre not. Lamput learns an important lesson from a nearby blobby little girl. Be yourself, and if anyones got a problem with that, they can go find their own patch of sand.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, its an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases ones sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemmings natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santas magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks hes won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Power Punch signs up for the strength tournament and blows everyone away. But his power causes an earthquake that threatens to destroy Kaboom City.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom finds out he won a contest to be in a cat food commercial, his behavior turns smug. This irritates Jerry, who goes to great lengths to ruin the commercial shoot at the house as Tom struggles in his role.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby upgrades Bot to a Bot-y Guard. When Tom breaks in and sets off Bots defensive systems, things get out of control and Bot terrorizes the whole lab crew. Jerry and Napoleon must figure out how to disarm Bot without hurting him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece -featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities, one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV, Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car, his favorite she-bear would be interested in him. He decides to confiscate the Lemmings crate on wheels and give it a serious overhaul. The Lemmings have nothing against an upgrade, as long as they remain behind the wheel!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortuneteller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy who wishes to recover his couch tries to straighten up but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels. The Lemmings immediately try to get their paws on it, but Grizzy also covets the board as a table to set his TV-dinners down on.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Its the middle of the night and Tom plays makeshift instruments creating loud music that wakes up Jerry. Jerry tries to put an end to Toms concert with no success. Tuffy wakes up and goes along with the music. Jerry decides to join in on the fun.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. F 3/3

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. Hes too powerful for the Batwheels to stop, but Buff finds a friendly solution to end the city shaking shenanigans.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! -F 3/3

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks! / Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast. F 3/3

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires the Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lolas tablet breaks and she must rely on her own abilities to complete the job.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Looney Builders are asked to redesign the final hole of the Acme Acres Mini Golf Course, Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids who will be playing it.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Beaver Brothers hire the Looney Builders to build a log cabin for them, they soon cause the job to be neglected by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse leads Jerry to take refuge in his hole in the wall where he runs into Franky Two-Face the rat, who now calls Jerrys home, HIS home. Tom finds this funny, of course. Franky Two-Face leads Tom to believe the two are working together but Frankys a no-good, dirty rat. He doesnt play fair. Hes a liar, a sneak, a dirty player, just an all-around dirty rat. He goes to the cats in the alley, says Jerry thinks theyre soft, steals things from Spike and sets Tom up as the thief. Franky Two-Face knows every dirty trick in the book, except one; the one Tom and Jerry use to get rid of Franky Two-Face.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Toms bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerrys loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Toms affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Toms animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildies wand to reverse the spell, but it wont be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: Someones in the Kitchen with Mynah
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebodys got to go.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its that special time of year when the Lady of the Houses rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. Its up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, theyre on their way, much to Toms chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. Its up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippys determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippys instruction. He soon realises its because Glitch saw the comet hes been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ellas best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyones amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still cant nail it

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But its a metal so rare its only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty tries to teach Mole, Hedge and Toad the rules of poetry but loses Hedges poem in the strong wind. / Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him. But will Kingfisher now ever be able to leave the Wild Woods?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. Its up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Toomas ja sõbrad
programme.sub-title: Train School: The Height of Courage
programme.desc: Faced with a super-high bridge on the way to a parade of brave engines, Percy has to find the courage within himself to cross.

programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad installs a new Mauss security system to protect Toad Hall from the weasels but Toads arrogance and rudeness towards Mauss leaves Toad locked out of Toad Hall for good. Only a big mouse sized apology can put things right.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it. The weasels trap Toad in the hammock, leaving Toad Hall wide open for them. Can Toads friends use the hammock to regain Toad Hall?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies - which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Power Punch signs up for the strength tournament and blows everyone away. But his power causes an earthquake that threatens to destroy Kaboom City.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!

programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean

Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

They convince the Boss to let them use more and more expensive vehicles, using an age-old corporate strategy commonly referred to as "diminishing returns". For scientists, these dudes sure are slow learners.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Everyones favorite cat-and-mouse duo, Tom and Jerry, is joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration in the all-new holiday special Santas Little Helpers. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop -- until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship? Directed by Darrel Van Citters and written by Jim Praytor and Robert Zappia, this wacky Tom and Jerry outing features the voice talents of Tom Kenny, Gary Cole, Simon Helberg, Julie Wittner, Grey DeLisle and Rachael MacFarlane.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings shave ice from the icefield and whip it into granita, but the result is flavorless. He decides to make granita in an empty jar of Yummy so that the chocolate left over on the sides of the jar will flavor the dessert. Its delicious! The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-loeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where theyd hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzys TV. But it doesnt take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but its no vacation. The cousins missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: Little Quacker and Mister Fuzzy Hide
programme.desc: When the witches herb garden is ruined, Tom sets a trap to catch the culprit. Kwaker helps him but turns out to be the culprit himself. Little Quaker keeps turning into "Giant Quaker" and Tom and Jerry make a soup to get him back to normal. Ultimately, it turns out that Giant Quaker had changed into Little Quaker and not the other way around.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean

When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

Masha acts like a real Robin Hood. She wants to help this lost soul to return home. Meanwhile, the Wolves are trying to get to our guest. / This is a very long car ride! What fun things can we look for out the window that will make the time go faster? / Tom and Jerry mistake burglars loot for a bag of donuts.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Up to their usual antics, Tom, Jerry and Spike get into monkey business with a drone at Rick and Gingers house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, hes determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Lady of the Manors prize Pomeranian, Alfred, must get some pounds off before the big dog show. The butler suggests exercise—chasing a cat perhaps? Tom happily obliges, as Alfreds successful weight loss guarantees him a cushy spot upstairs. Meanwhile, Jerry aims to sabotage Toms efforts.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Lady of the Houses cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesnt catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Animated series for younger viewers. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. She prepares for the most interstellar Momella Day yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Animated series for younger viewers. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they cant hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad installs a new Mauss security system to protect Toad Hall from the weasels but Toads arrogance and rudeness towards Mauss leaves Toad locked out of Toad Hall for good. Only a big mouse sized apology can put things right.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it. The weasels trap Toad in the hammock, leaving Toad Hall wide open for them. Can Toads friends use the hammock to regain Toad Hall?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Missing Pears
programme.desc: Many of the riverbank folk have their eyes on Toads ripe pears. Ratty offers to guard the pear tree all night but in the morning, all the pears are gone thus mounting an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Rattys brother comes to visit, Ratty has to pretend that he lives in Toad Hall as he had claimed in his letters. / When Mole goes to find Hedge in the Wild Woods without his glasses, the weasels play a nasty trick on him and Mole falls into a ditch with Hedge.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Mole goes to find Hedge in the Wild Woods without his glasses, the weasels play a nasty trick on him and Mole falls into a ditch with Hedge. How will they ever get out to find Badger and get Moles glasses fixed?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a new bookcase but it is missing one vital element! / Mr Bean takes Teddy on a seaside holiday but a precocious child decides she should be Teddys best and only friend! / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. / Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.
